nodes.text: The Trandoshan Relic was a tablet under Darth Skotia's possession in his bunker during the Cold War. Trandoshans were obliged to serve whoever owned it. It was stolen from the bunker by Lord Zash's apprentice and was later used by the apprentice in his duel with Darth Skotia, turning his Trandoshan bodyguards against him. However, Skotia easily killed the Trandoshans.
